title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
description: When using the hyperlink builder, the title should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it is currently changing with the settings. This bug needs to be fixed.
OB: When clicking 'OK' and reopening the hyperlink builder, the title changes to 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Click on 'OK' in the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected result:
The title of the hyperlink builder should remain as 'Hyperlink Options'.
